title: ninaivirukkum pOdE
sahitya:
nivaivirukkum pOdE unnai ninaikka vENDum shrI jayahari


anupallavi

  sinattai venru manattai venru cittam aDakki bhaktiyuDanE


caraNam    pUttu maNandu vADi udirum pUvaip-pOlum dEham porundi irundu
varundip-pOghum bhuvip-poruL tarum bhOgam sAttirangaLum marandu pOgum
sArnda uravum tIrndu nOghum Atma jnAna bhakti kUDi anbaruDanE Adip-pADi
